entry.string: oc process -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sogis/pipelines/master/api_webgisclient/dataproduct-service/deployment/deploymentconfig.yaml -p NAMESPACE=gdi-integration -p TAG=v2.0.11 -p REPLICAS=1 -p CPU_REQUEST=150m -p CPU_LIMIT=350m -p MEMORY_REQUEST=100Mi -p MEMORY_LIMIT=200Mi -p BASEURL=geo-i.so.ch | oc apply -n gdi-integration -f- oc rollout latest -n gdi-integration dataproduct-service oc rollout status -n gdi-integration dc dataproduct-service
